mapper.select: select drug_clazz_id, drug_clazz_name from drug_clazz where drug_clazz_status = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into drug_clazz
drug_clazz_id,
drug_clazz_name,
drug_clazz_status,

mapper.update:
update drug_clazz

where drug_clazz_id = #{drugClazzId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
